reviews.review_msg: Prof sends out 1 email/week about weekly topics. Course graded on discussions(min.600words/week), reading activities(700words/week),& 3 assignments. You're teaching yourself from the textbook. Wouldn't take this course if not a requirement. Topics in the text are interesting but wished the prof had added more to the class. Fairly easy marker though

The prof provided no material to the class, the only resource is reading the textbook which is very dense and hard to read through. I studied through the whole course load by myself and she provided no support or explanation of concepts. Overall very disappointed by the class structure and lack of engaging material.

I reccomend taking this in person It was content heavy but,I did find collaborating with group members helpful. The midterm and the final were all written questions (short answer and an essay) HOWEVER, we were allowed to bring the textbook each time and bring in one page of notes double sided. The TM was alright but took weeks to mark assignments.
If you take this through distance education, focus on the courseware more.  She's gonna ask specific questions in the final exam.  She's so into details.  However, the TA was nice.
Very unorganized.  Nice, but doesn't get the job done
